name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"48462a62-b71e-499d-aa3f-b5d5c81d6d4b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: iterate_mod_items","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9e6cde9b-7cb9-4409-8953-452f1653c4a4","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"iterate_mod_items","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is an internal helper used during the initialization of a module. Its specific role is to take a raw list of names (discovered during a preliminary scan of the file) and convert them into formal Definition objects that are registered in the module's scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0a470de5-d7ae-4be8-9ae9-a5db81463690","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Static analysis often faces a "chicken and egg" problem. If Class A references Class B, but Class B is defined lower down in the file, a strictly linear line-by-line analysis might fail to resolve Class B when analyzing Class A. To solve this, the analyzer performs a pre-scan to find all top-level names first. This function takes those names and populates the "symbol table" (Scope) immediately. This ensures that by the time the analyzer looks at the code details, all top-level classes and functions are already "known" entities.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"07326d50-4ba9-48ae-b06b-9650be287c54","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b8e001be-14e2-4cff-a0da-c7f9f9018f05","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Iterate Candidates:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It loops through a list of fully qualified names (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"["my_module.MyClass", "my_module.utils.helper"]","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") passed to it.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3aaae4cb-a474-4699-a44e-22085928e7a2","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Ensure Definition:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" For each name, it checks the Definition Manager. If a definition doesn't exist yet, it creates one using the specific type constant provided (e.g., marking it as a Function or a Class).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bb5db3b8-1dbb-4493-a7fc-7c4dc3cd0fd8","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Placement:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"ba256fbb-e115-4121-b41c-b01d8534a25e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It parses the name string to separate the item's name (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"User","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") from its parent location (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"app.models","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fad617d1-13ba-42f9-ab3c-4c9f849ecb1a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It retrieves the scope object for that parent location.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"c92d4306-072f-4fb2-9091-48da5500c423","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It officially adds the new definition to that parent scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"a7b8ea85-8346-4565-81ea-5b65ffb9007d","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Class Registration:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" If the items being processed are classes (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"const == CLS_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), it performs an extra step: registering the class with the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"class_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". This is necessary to track inheritance and Method Resolution Order (MRO) later.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"81b3ddd2-c71e-4de3-abb6-759b639b4053","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Input ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"["game.player.Hero", "game.player.Enemy"]","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"17e851d6-6a5b-49a7-aaeb-0228017469a0","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"const","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CLS_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (Class Definition constant)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"99d836c9-4b98-475f-800c-a8f8130ccb49","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Process:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5ad8ee2a-fe01-4d6d-81d8-d38b923a0c90","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The function looks at ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"game.player.Hero","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a4f63d5e-f155-4a30-967f-3bcdb25bb4db","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a Class Definition object for it.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9f81324d-e0a0-4592-af04-7e1a44be8c7b","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It splits the string: Parent is ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"game.player","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", Name is ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Hero","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1fc1e3d0-470b-4e1e-b885-4665b89ea09c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It gets the scope for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"game.player","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and adds ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Hero","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to it.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"eb39177b-bf9f-41d1-893a-b21fa2f4c37b","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It tells the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"class_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to track ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"game.player.Hero","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e9696c1d-34c4-424d-acf2-2ad33033f991","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It repeats the process for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Enemy","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9b1c01ca-6ebf-4501-b97c-040dfb74aa45","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Result: Before the analyzer even enters the line ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"class Hero:","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the scope ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"game.player","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" already knows that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Hero","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" exists.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"685ad533-a298-4b10-937d-fb0823a43469","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
